spring.controller

Class RESTPermissionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.RESTPermissionController

  • @RestController
public class RESTPermissionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Requests that are implemented in this class: 1) GET /auth/permissions 2) GET /auth/roles/{id}/permissions 3) PUT /auth/roles/{id}/permissions

      • filter

        public java.util.Collection<RESTPermission> filter(java.util.Collection<RESTPermission> permissions,
                                                   java.lang.String resource,
                                                   java.lang.String action)
        Parameters:
        permissions - collection of permissions that should be filtered. This method does NOT alter this collection in any way
        resource - null if should not be filtered on resource. The filtering is case-insensitive contains
        action - null if should not be filtered on action. The filtering is case-insensitive contains
        Returns:
        a new collection with all the RESTPermissions of permissions that pass the filters
